Martin Chapman Fromm

About me

A graphic designer, typographer, user experience specialist and business founder. I run Lightbox Darkroom, an open photographic darkroom; Ten O’Clock Books, a photographic book publisher; Error, a successful digital agency; and, Humap, an interactive map platform.

Contact me on the details below if you’d like to discuss working on a graphic design or photographic project together.
